name: df-pi
body: |- wceq(cpi, cinf(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(csin), csn(nat0))), cr, clt))
comment: Define the constant pi, ` _pi ` = 3.14159..., which is the smallest positive number whose sine is zero. Definition of ` _pi ` in [Gleason] p. 311. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 23-Jan-2008.) (Revised by AV, 14-Sep-2020.)
